info.title: FullContact Card Reader API
info.description: The API for managing FullContact Card Readers

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: This API key is assigned to you by FullContact. It is used to identify and authorize your request. Your API key should be kept private, and should never be displayed publicly.

parameters.name: casing
parameters.description: Card Reader can alter the casing of certain fields in the final results.

parameters.name: Custom Params
parameters.description: Card Reader has the ability to funnel your own custom params through requests.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Used to specify response in json.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: You can either send in the files as a multipart/form-data request or as a JSON object with BASE64 encoded images.

parameters.name: returnedData
parameters.description: A response can contain verified and unverified data, this parameter can be used to exclude unverified data from being returned in the response.

parameters.name: sandbox
parameters.description: Card Reader Sandbox is a free, quick response mode for testing and development.

parameters.name: URID
parameters.description: URID stands for Unique Request Identifier.

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Used to specify the quality of transcription. Calls to verified=medium|high require a FullContact premium account.

parameters.name: webhookUrl
parameters.description: This is the URL that a request will be made to once the card has been processed.
